author: James Joyce
text: Yanks who hae wi’ Wallace read, Yanks whom Joyce has often bled, Welcome to the hard plank bed, And bolschevistic flea. Who for Bloom and Inisfail Longs to pine in Sing Sing jail, Picking oakum without bail, Let him publish me. Best Xmas greetings to Mrs Pound and yourself from us all (see other side). Circe finished this morning at last. Will revise, type and forward soon. No news re above. James Joyce  [signed also by George, Lucia, and Nora Joyce]
